Properties.Schema:
<!-- Copyright 1994-2010 SYSPRO Ltd.-->
<!-- 
     Schema for the List of Sales Orders Business Object
-->
<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified">
  <xsd:element name="Query">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>This is the root element</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:complexType>
      <xsd:sequence>
        <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Option" type="Option" />
        <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Filter" type="Filter" />
      </xsd:sequence>
    </xsd:complexType>
  </xsd:element>
  <xsd:complexType name="AlternateKey">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Alternate key to be selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, L - List or S - Single alternate key, FilterValue contains the selected alternate key if FilterType is S or a range or list of alternate keys separated by commas)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="L" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="Branch">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Branch to be selected (FilterType of A - All, S - Single branch, FilterValue contains the selected branch if FilterType is S).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="Customer">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Customer to be selected (FilterType of A - All, S - Single customer, FilterValue contains the selected customer if FilterType is S).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="CustomerPo">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Customer purchase order number to be selected (FilterType of A - All, S - Single p/o number, FilterValue contains the selected p/o number if FilterType is S).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="Filter">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>This contains one or more filters to restrict the amount of data returned</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:sequence>
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Salesperson" type="Salesperson" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Branch" type="Branch" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Customer" type="Customer" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="OrderType" type="OrderType" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="CustomerPo" type="CustomerPo" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="SalesOrder" type="SalesOrder" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="OrderDate" type="OrderDate" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="OrderStatus" type="OrderStatus" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="AlternateKey" type="AlternateKey" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="GeographicArea" type="GeographicArea" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="RequestedShipDate" type="RequestedShipDate" />
    </xsd:sequence>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="IncludeCancelledOrders">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Do you wish to include cancelled orders (N - No, Y - Yes)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:enumeration value="N" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="Y" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="IncludeCompletedOrders">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Do you wish to include completed orders (N - No, Y - Yes)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:enumeration value="N" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="Y" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="IncludeForwardOrders">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Do you wish to include forward orders (N - No, Y - Yes)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:enumeration value="N" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="Y" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:complexType name="Option">
    <xsd:sequence>
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="IncludeCompletedOrders" type="IncludeCompletedOrders" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="IncludeCancelledOrders" type="IncludeCancelledOrders" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="IncludeForwardOrders" type="IncludeForwardOrders" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="StartAtOrder" type="StartAtOrder" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ReturnOrders" type="ReturnOrders" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="OutstandingQty" type="OutstandingQty" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ReturnPreviousOrder" type="ReturnPreviousOrder" />
      <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="XslStylesheet" type="XslStylesheet" />
    </xsd:sequence>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="GeographicArea">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Geographic area to be selected (FilterType of A - All, S - Single geographic area, FilterValue contains the selected geographic area if FilterType is S)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="OrderDate">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Sales order dates selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, FilterValue is range of order dates separated by a comma if FilterType is R).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" type="xsd:string" use="optional" />
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="OrderStatus">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Order status to be selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, L - List or S - Single order status, FilterValue contains the selected order status if FilterType is S or a range or list of order status separated by commas)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="L" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="OrderType">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Order type to be selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, L - List or S - Single order type, FilterValue contains the selected order type if FilterType is S or a range or list of order types separated by commas).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="L" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="OutstandingQty">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>This element specifies if the order detail lines are to be checked based on quantity. I - ignore, do not check detial lines, otherwise the order is checked to see if it contains one or more lines with an outstanding quantity of B - Back order , O - outstanding (ship plus back order), S - Ship.</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="I" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="B" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="O" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:complexType name="RequestedShipDate">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Requested ship dates selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, FilterValue is range of requested ship dates separated by a comma if FilterType is R).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="ReturnPreviousOrder">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>This element is set to 'Y' if the previous and next information is to be obtained.</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="N" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="Y" />
      <xsd:enumeration value="" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="ReturnOrders">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>The number of orders to return. If this is specified then this number of orders will be returned. If blank then 20 will be returned. If the element is not used, then all orders for the selection criteria will be returned. If entered, the element must contain a numeric value.</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:complexType name="SalesOrder">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Sales order numbers to be selected (FilterType of A - All, R - Range, FilterValue is range of sales order numbers separated by a commas if FilterType is R).</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional" default="A">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="R" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:complexType name="Salesperson">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>Salesperson to be selected (FilterType of A - All, S - Single salesperson, FilterValue contains the selected salesperson if FilterType is S)</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterType" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:enumeration value="S" />
          <xsd:enumeration value="A" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
    <xsd:attribute name="FilterValue" use="optional">
      <xsd:simpleType>
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
          <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
        </xsd:restriction>
      </xsd:simpleType>
    </xsd:attribute>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="StartAtOrder">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>This is the primary key to the sales order master table. This is optional and will default to the beginning of the file. If a range of orders is also selected, then this starting point will only be used if it is greater than or equal to the start of the range.</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
  <xsd:simpleType name="XslStylesheet">
    <xsd:annotation>
      <xsd:documentation>The XSL Stylesheet to be used</xsd:documentation>
    </xsd:annotation>
    <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
      <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve" />
    </xsd:restriction>
  </xsd:simpleType>
</xsd:schema>
Properties.Name: DataXml
Properties.Value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="Windows-1252"?>
<!-- Copyright 1994-2010 SYSPRO Ltd.-->
<!-- 
     This is an example XML instance to demonstrate
     use of the List of Sales Orders Business Object
-->
<Query xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsd:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="SORQSO.XSD">
  <Option>
    <IncludeCompletedOrders>Y</IncludeCompletedOrders>
    <IncludeCancelledOrders>Y</IncludeCancelledOrders>
    <IncludeForwardOrders>Y</IncludeForwardOrders>
    <StartAtOrder/>
    <ReturnOrders/>
    <OutstandingQty/>
    <ReturnPreviousOrder/>
    <XslStylesheet/>
  </Option>
  <Filter>
    <Salesperson FilterType="S" FilterValue="100"/>
    <Branch FilterType="S" FilterValue="10"/>
    <Customer FilterType="S" FilterValue="000010"/>
    <OrderType FilterType="A"/>
    <CustomerPo FilterType="A"/>
    <SalesOrder FilterType="R" FilterValue="000790,000812"/>
    <OrderDate FilterType="R" FilterValue="2006-02-01,2006-02-28"/>
    <OrderStatus FilterType="L" FilterValue="1,F,9"/>
    <AlternateKey FilterType="A"/>
    <GeographicArea FilterType="A"/>
    <RequestedShipDate FilterType="A"/>
  </Filter>
</Query>

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<xs:schema id="Documents"
           targetNamespace="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           elementFormDefault="qualified"
           xmlns="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           xmlns:mstns="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" >


  <xs:element name="Documents">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>

        <xs:element name="Connection">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="Identifier" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"></xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="Configuration" nillable="false">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="DocumentType" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the type of document to be created.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="ArSalesOrders"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ArCreditNotes"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ApPurchaseOrders"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ApReturns"></xs:enumeration>
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ProcessAllOrNone" nillable="true" type="xs:boolean" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>When True, all documents will be processed in a single transaction. After processing all documents, if any have failed the entire transaction will be rolled back. Setting this to false (default behaviour) transacts documents one at a time.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="Document">
          <xs:annotation>
            <xs:documentation>Supports Adding of Sales Orders, Credit Notes, Purchase Orders and Returns.</xs:documentation>
          </xs:annotation>
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="DocumentID" nillable="true" type="xs:int">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This value is populated by the engine once the document has been created or completed, used to identify the document for 'CompleteExisting'</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Reference" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The reference with which to create the document. Only valid if ProcessAction is 'Complete'.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ProcessAction" nillable="false">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="Create">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Creates an unprocessed document.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="Complete">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Creates and processes the document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="CompleteExisting">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Complete the document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ProcessExisting">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Processes an created unproccessed document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="Update">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Updates an existing document. Used to add/update/delete lines.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Account" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>For A/R documents, this is the Customer code. For A/P documents, this is the Supplier code.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Representative" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Sales Rep (Only applicable to A/R documents).</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ReferenceDocumentNumber" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>For Sales Orders, this is the delivery note number. For Purchase Orders, this is the supplier invoice number. For Credit Notes and Returns, this is the invoice number.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ExternalOrderNo" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the external order number or Customer Purchase Order Number.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="OrderNo" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the Order Number associated with the document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="InvoiceTo" type="Address" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the Postal Address in the order document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="DeliverTo" type="Address" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the Physical Address in the order document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Currency" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The currency to be used for the document. This must be a valid foreign currency code or left blank if local currency is to be used.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Description" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The description of the document that appears in statements.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Discount" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The currency value discount in local currency to be applied to the document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="DiscountPercent" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The percentage discount to be applied to the document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="DueDate" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Format as dd/MM/yyyy.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="DeliveryDate" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Format as dd/MM/yyyy.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="InvoiceDate" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Format as dd/MM/yyyy.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="MessageLine1" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the first message line.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="MessageLine2" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the second message line.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="MessageLine3" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the third message line.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="OrderDate" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Format as dd/MM/yyyy.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="OrderStatus" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>A valid order status code as defined in Order Entry/Maintenance/Order Status. This status appears under the "Order" tab in the document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Tag" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>User-defined field</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="AgingTerm" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>User-defined field</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="TaxMode" nillable="true">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="Inc">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Tax Inclusive</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="Exc">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Tax Exclusive</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="I">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Tax Inclusive</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="E">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Tax Exclusive</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="DeliveryNote" nillable ="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the delivery note number for the document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>

              <xs:element name="DetailLines" type="DetailLines" ></xs:element>

              <xs:element name="UserDefinedFields" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="UserDefinedField" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="Field">
                            <xs:annotation>
                              <xs:documentation>The field you wish to set a user-defined value for. Select the table and then field you wish to update from the Administration/System Configuration/User-Defined Fields dialog in Pastel Evolution in order to discover the database field name for the user-defined field in question.</xs:documentation>
                            </xs:annotation>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="Value" nillable="true">
                            <xs:annotation>
                              <xs:documentation>The value you wish to assign to the user-defined field. The interpretation of this value depends on the data-type of the user-defined field.</xs:documentation>
                            </xs:annotation>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="Tag" nillable="true">
                            <xs:annotation>
                              <xs:documentation>User-defined field.</xs:documentation>
                            </xs:annotation>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>

              <xs:element name="Status">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Populated by the engine once for each individual document.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="Success" nillable="true" type="xs:boolean" />
                    <xs:element name="Message" nillable="true" type="xs:string">
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>

            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute name="autoPrintProfile" type="xs:string" use="optional"></xs:attribute>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="StatusSummary">
          <xs:annotation>
            <xs:documentation>
              Populated by the engine once an entire xml document has been processed,
              element represents a summary of all Status elements.
              Note the outcome based on the value of Configuration/AllOrNone in derived
              schema.
              When False: Successfull and Valid will contain the same values
              When True: Valid will contain the number of documents checked and found valid.
              Successfull will either be 0 or the same as Processed. If one or more documents
              failed, successful will be 0. If nothing failed, successfull will be same
              as processed (and valid).
            </xs:documentation>
          </xs:annotation>
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="Processed" type="xs:int" />
              <xs:element name="Successful" type="xs:int" />
              <xs:element name="Valid" type="xs:int" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>

  <xs:complexType name="DetailLines">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:annotation>
        <xs:documentation></xs:documentation>
      </xs:annotation>
      <xs:element name="DetailLine" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <xs:complexType>
          <xs:sequence>
            <xs:element name="LineID" nillable ="true" type="xs:long">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>This is required when LineAction is Update or Delete. Must be blank when LineAction is Add</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="LineAction" nillable="true">
              <xs:simpleType>
                <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                  <xs:enumeration value="Add">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>[Default] Adds a new line. LineID must be empty</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="Update">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Update an existing line. The LineID must be specified</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="Delete">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Deletes a line. The LineID must be specified</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                </xs:restriction>
              </xs:simpleType>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="LineType" nillable="true">
              <xs:simpleType>
                <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                  <xs:enumeration value="Stk">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>[Default] Stock Item</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="GL">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>General ledger code</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                </xs:restriction>
              </xs:simpleType>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="StockItem" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The Item Code for this line.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="GL" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The GL Code for this line.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="OverrideCostOfSalesAccount" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The GL Code to override the cost of sales account.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="OverridePurchaseAccount" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The GL Code to override the purchase account.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="OverrideSalesAccount" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The GL Code to override the sales account.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="OverrideStockAccount" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The GL Code to override the stock account.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Description" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The optional description for this line.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Quantity" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The quantity to place on order.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="ToProcess" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>When ProcessAction is Create, specify the quantity that should be marked for processing when the document is processed within Pastel Evolution. This field has no effect on unprocessed documents.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="UnitCostPrice" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The Unit Cost price.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="UnitSellingPrice" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Local currency unit selling price. For local currency documents, populate this field and leave UnitSellingPriceForeign blank</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="UnitSellingPriceForeign" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Foreign currency unit selling price. For foreign currency documents, populate this field and leave UnitSellingPrice blank</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Discount" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Specify a currency value discount here or a percentage in DiscountPercent</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="DiscountPercent" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Specify a discount percentage here or a currency value discount in Discount</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="TaxMode" nillable="true">
              <xs:simpleType>
                <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                  <xs:enumeration value="Inc">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Tax Inclusive</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="Exc">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Tax Exclusive</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="I">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Tax Inclusive</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                  <xs:enumeration value="E">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>Tax Exclusive</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:enumeration>
                </xs:restriction>
              </xs:simpleType>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="SerialNumbers" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
              <xs:complexType>
                <xs:sequence>
                  <xs:element name="Code" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                    <xs:annotation>
                      <xs:documentation>The serial number associated with this line.</xs:documentation>
                    </xs:annotation>
                  </xs:element>
                </xs:sequence>
              </xs:complexType>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="TaxType" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The Tax Type for this line. If both the header and line Tax Types are specified, they must be the same.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Note" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Additional information for the line.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Warehouse" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The code of the warehouse to allocate stock from.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Representative" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>The Sales Rep to allocate this line to.</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Tag" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>User-defined field</xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>
            </xs:element>
            <xs:element name="Project" nillable="true">
              <xs:annotation>
                <xs:documentation>Set the stock code </xs:documentation>
              </xs:annotation>              
            </xs:element>                        
          </xs:sequence>
        </xs:complexType>
      </xs:element>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <xs:complexType name="Address">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element name="Class" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>PO - Use the Postal Address defined for the account, PH - Use the Physical Address defined for the account. Blank - Use the specified address. When PO or PH are used, none of the other details need to be filled in.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
        <xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
            <xs:enumeration value="PO"></xs:enumeration>
            <xs:enumeration value="PH"></xs:enumeration>
            <xs:enumeration value=""></xs:enumeration>
          </xs:restriction>
        </xs:simpleType>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="Line1" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the first address line.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>

        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the second address line.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>

        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the third address line.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="Line4" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the fourth address line.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="Line5" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the fifth address line.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="PostalCode" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>This is the postal code.</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="Tag" nillable="true">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation>User-defined field</xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

<xs:schema id="Documents"
           targetNamespace="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           elementFormDefault="qualified"
           xmlns="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           xmlns:mstns="http://flowgear.net/Schemas/PastelEvolution/Documents.xsd"
           xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" >


  <xs:element name="Documents">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>

        <xs:element name="Connection">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="Identifier" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"></xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="Configuration" nillable="false">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="DocumentType" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the type of document to be created.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="ArSalesOrders"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ArCreditNotes"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ApPurchaseOrders"></xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ApReturns"></xs:enumeration>
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ProcessAllOrNone" nillable="true" type="xs:boolean" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>When True, all documents will be processed in a single transaction. After processing all documents, if any have failed the entire transaction will be rolled back. Setting this to false (default behaviour) transacts documents one at a time.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

        <xs:element name="Document">
          <xs:annotation>
            <xs:documentation>Supports Adding of Sales Orders, Credit Notes, Purchase Orders and Returns.</xs:documentation>
          </xs:annotation>
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="DocumentID" nillable="true" type="xs:int">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This value is populated by the engine once the document has been created or completed, used to identify the document for 'CompleteExisting'</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Reference" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>The reference with which to create the document. Only valid if ProcessAction is 'Complete'.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ProcessAction" nillable="false">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
                    <xs:enumeration value="Create">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Creates an unprocessed document.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="Complete">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Creates and processes the document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="CompleteExisting">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Complete the document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="ProcessExisting">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Processes an created unproccessed document. The document will be marked as Archived in Pastel Evolution.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                    <xs:enumeration value="Update">
                      <xs:annotation>
                        <xs:documentation>Updates an existing document. Used to add/update/delete lines.</xs:documentation>
                      </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:enumeration>
                  </xs:restriction>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Account" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>For A/R documents, this is the Customer code. For A/P documents, this is the Supplier code.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Representative" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>Sales Rep (Only applicable to A/R documents).</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ReferenceDocumentNumber" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>For Sales Orders, this is the delivery note number. For Purchase Orders, this is the supplier invoice number. For Credit Notes and Returns, this is the invoice number.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ExternalOrderNo" nillable="true">
                <xs:annotation>
                  <xs:documentation>This is the external order number or Customer Purchase Order Number.</xs:documentation>
                </xs:annotation>
              </xs:element>
